resources.string: %1$s requires an update to the Android Wear app.
%1$s" won't run unless you update the Android Wear app."
%1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s" won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
%1$s" won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
%1$s" won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
An application requires Google Play services to be enabled.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
An application requires an update for Google Play services.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
%1$s" won't run unless you update Google Play services."
%1$s" won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
We hope you enjoy using BisPhone to get in touch with your friends and family.
"You don't have any application to handle this task"
Please update to latest version if you want to keep using application
"You deleted recipients messages. There is no info to show."
Broadcast list name can not be blank
You may find & follow your favorite channels.
"Message will be sent, Create broadcast list too?"
Problem while picking image, please try again
The size of selected image is too big
You have exceeded the maximum limit of created groups and you are not allowed to do more.
"creating group %1$s failed. Please check your network status and try again."
Are you sure you want to delete the history of the group?
Are you sure you want to Delete and Unfollow %1$s ?
Are you sure you want to Delete %1$s ?
"Are you sure you want to destroy group %1$s ? By doing this, all members will be kicked out and the group will be unavailable forever."
Are you sure want to kick %1$s ?
"By selecting Leave you will leave the group but The group Conversation will not be deleted. By selecting Leave and Delete you will leave the group and The group Conversation will be deleted."
Are you sure you want to Remove %1$s ?
Are you sure you want to Unfollow %1$s ?
Select your Country and Enter Your Phone Number to Get Started
Your photo will be used when you are talking to your friends.
Your invitation to this group has expired.
Group reached maximum number of members and you cannot join.
Group reached maximum number of members. You cannot invite new members.
You cannot invite new members. please try later
Size of image is too large for profile avatar
The number of selected members is exceeded
Group reached maximum number of members. You cannot invite new members
Only group creator can send invitations.
You was kicked out of the group.
Group can not be create. You have exceeded the maximum number of the joined group.
You can not join the group. You have exceeded the maximum number of the joined group
"The group has been destroyed by administrator. You can no longer send or receive any messages."
Further invitations from this group will be ignored. You can manage blocked groups in settings.
"%1$s has invited you to %2$s. Tap to accept or decline."
Please wait while your group membership being migrated …
Group name can not be blank
All group members can send invitations.
Are you sure you want to invite this user to group again?
"Action Permissions: Invite members: Admin only Kick out members: Admin only Change setting: Admin only"
"Action Permissions: Invite members: Everyone Kick out members: Admin only Change setting: Admin only"
"Action Permissions: Invite members: Everyone Kick out members: No one Change setting: Everyone"
"You have been kicked out of this group. You can no longer send or receive any messages."
"You have left the group. You can no longer send or receive any messages."
You can not change setting of %1$S.
You can not invite anyone to %1$S.
Admin left. The group type changed to Unmoderated.
you can not select more than 8 picture in one time
"In order to use location sharing it's required to update your Google Play Services"
Submit your phone number to get started
You will receive the verification code via text message.
"Choosing 'Deactivate' will remove your data from BisPhone and deactivate your BisPhone account."
Are you sure you want to mark all channel messages as read?
Are you sure you want to mark all groups messages as read?
you can not reply any message.
Users who do not have you in their contacts will see your nickname instead.(your phone number will be hidden)
Your nickName must have at least 3 character
"You don't have bisphone friends, send invitations!"
No contacts found on your device!
Start a conversation with your friends!
There is no message for delete.
Click here to start a conversation.
Access is required in order to discover your friends in BisPhone network and create your BisPhone friend list.
"By sending your contact info, your phone number will be visible to %1$s and he/she can message you. You can communicate with %2$s when you get a reply."
"Hey, join BisPhone now! It's a great application that lets you keep in touch with your family and friends. http://bisphone.com/"
"BisPhone is great to keep in touch with family and friends on your phone. http://bisphone.com/"

"This is an automatic contact request. Sender of this message has sent his/her contact info to you and does not have your phone number. If you respond to this message, your phone number will become visible to the sender, and he/she can message you."
You must select at last 2 members
Automatically save images and videos that you receive into the Gallery.
"Choosing 'Clean Up All Message' will remove all message and media from cache."
"Choosing 'Clean Up Broadcast Lists Message' will remove all broadcast lists message and it`s media from cache."
"Choosing 'Clean Up Channel Message' will remove all channel message and it`s media from cache."
"Choosing 'Clean Up Group Message' will remove all group message and it`s media from cache."
"Choosing 'Clean Up' will remove all media from cache."
Clean Up One To One Message
"Choosing 'Clean Up One To One Message' will remove all one to one message and it`s media from cache."
Changing content language will change channel,stickers ... language.
You must select at least one language.
"Choosing 'Deactivate' will remove your data from BisPhone and deactivate your BisPhone account."
Manually synchronize your phone contacts with BisPhone.
Remove your account and sign out
Submit your phone number to get start
Only alphanumeric characters, space, dash and underline are allowed! Nicknames must start and end with alphanumeric characters.
Nickname length must be between 4 and 20 characters
Nickname must contain at least one letter.
You will receive the verification code as a text message
"It seems there's not enough space on your device. please free some disk space"
"It seems disk storage is currently not available. please make sure you have inserted sd-card or it's not locked by your usb computer connection"
Disk storage is connected via USB mass storage.
Application not found to handle Capturing image!
No phone number associated to this contact.
Downloaded video is corrupted, please try again.
Video download failed, please try again.
Problem while Sending video message , Please try again
"Changing group name failed. Try again later."
"Fetching address… Please try again in a few seconds."
Please check your SD card, image capture is impossible!
Failed to save media to gallery.
You Must Peek at least one image.
You must select at least one media before sending.
Press again to cancel group creation.
Only alphabet, digits, underlines and hyphens are allowed for group name.
GMail is not installed on your device!
Facebook is not installed on your device!
Messaging is not installed on your device!
Twitter is not installed on your device!
You can try again in %1$s minutes!
Your contacts will soon be updated.
Please try again in a few seconds
Calls are not supported on your device.

A fast ImageView (and Drawable) that supports rounded corners (and ovals or circles) based on the original example from Romain Guy.
